sourcesContent:
const people = [ { name: 'Whitney Francis', role: 'Copywriter', imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517365830460-955ce3ccd263?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=8&w=1024&h=1024&q=80', bio: 'Ultricies massa malesuada viverra cras lobortis. Tempor orci hac ligula dapibus mauris sit ut eu. Eget turpis urna maecenas cras. Nisl dictum.', }, // More people... ] const Team = () => { return (

Meet our leadership

    {people.map((person) => (

  • {person.name}

    {person.role}

    {person.bio}

    • ))}
) } export default Team;
